member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO
member.summary: Specifies Desktop Window Manager (DWM) composition timing information. Used by the function.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cbSize
member.summary: The size of this DWM_TIMING_INFO structure.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.rateRefresh
member.summary: The monitor refresh rate.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.qpcRefreshPeriod
member.summary: The monitor refresh period.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.rateCompose
member.summary: The composition rate.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.qpcVBlank
member.summary: The query performance counter value before the vertical blank.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cRefresh
member.summary: The DWM refresh counter.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cDXRefresh
member.summary: The DirectX refresh counter.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.qpcCompose
member.summary: The query performance counter value for a frame composition.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFrame
member.summary: The frame number that was composed at qpcCompose.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cDXPresent
member.summary: The DirectX present number used to identify rendering frames.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cRefreshFrame
member.summary: The refresh count of the frame that was composed at qpcCompose.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFrameSubmitted
member.summary: The DWM frame number that was last submitted.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cDXPresentSubmitted
member.summary: The DirectX present number that was last submitted.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFrameConfirmed
member.summary: The DWM frame number that was last confirmed as presented.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cDXPresentConfirmed
member.summary: The DirectX present number that was last confirmed as presented.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cRefreshConfirmed
member.summary: The target refresh count of the last frame confirmed as completed by the GPU.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cDXRefreshConfirmed
member.summary: The DirectX refresh count when the frame was confirmed as presented.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFramesLate
member.summary: The number of frames the DWM presented late.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFramesOutstanding
member.summary: The number of composition frames that have been issued but have not been confirmed as completed.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFrameDisplayed
member.summary: The last frame displayed.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.qpcFrameDisplayed
member.summary: The QPC time of the composition pass when the frame was displayed.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cRefreshFrameDisplayed
member.summary: The vertical refresh count when the frame should have become visible.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFrameComplete
member.summary: The ID of the last frame marked as completed.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.qpcFrameComplete
member.summary: The QPC time when the last frame was marked as completed.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFramePending
member.summary: The ID of the last frame marked as pending.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.qpcFramePending
member.summary: The QPC time when the last frame was marked as pending.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFramesDisplayed
member.summary: The number of unique frames displayed. This value is valid only after a second call to the function.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFramesComplete
member.summary: The number of new completed frames that have been received.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFramesPending
member.summary: The number of new frames submitted to DirectX but not yet completed.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFramesAvailable
member.summary: The number of frames available but not displayed, used, or dropped. This value is valid only after a second call to .

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFramesDropped
member.summary: The number of rendered frames that were never displayed because composition occurred too late. This value is valid only after a second call to .

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cFramesMissed
member.summary: The number of times an old frame was composed when a new frame should have been used but was not available.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cRefreshNextDisplayed
member.summary: The frame count at which the next frame is scheduled to be displayed.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cRefreshNextPresented
member.summary: The frame count at which the next DirectX present is scheduled to be displayed.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cRefreshesDisplayed
member.summary: The total number of refreshes that have been displayed for the application since the function was last called.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cRefreshesPresented
member.summary: The total number of refreshes that have been presented by the application since was last called.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cRefreshStarted
member.summary: The refresh number when content for this window started to be displayed.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cPixelsReceived
member.summary: The total number of pixels DirectX redirected to the DWM.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cPixelsDrawn
member.summary: The number of pixels drawn.

member.name: DWM_TIMING_INFO.cBuffersEmpty
member.summary: The number of empty buffers in the flip chain.
